content.rendered:
The Kindergarten Registration Process for students who will be entering kindergarten in the 2024-2025 school year begins in January.  Families will receive a letter outlining the registration process in early January.

The District held a Virtual Kindergarten Information Night on Tuesday, January 16.  Click here to watch a recording of the Kindergarten Information Night Presentation.

Learn more about our six elementary schools, kindergarten curriculum, the student registration process, how to prepare your child for school, and more!
